code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{getNotes,deleteNote}from"../services/api";import NoteList from"../components/NoteList";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NoteListPage=_ref=>{let{setNoteToEdit}=_ref;const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);const fetchNotes=async()=>{try{const response=await getNotes();setNotes(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Gagal mengambil data:",error);}};const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await deleteNote(id);fetchNotes();}catch(error){console.error("Gagal menghapus catatan:",error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchNotes();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100 flex flex-col items-center p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NoteList,{notes:notes,fetchNotes:fetchNotes,handleDelete:handleDelete,setNoteToEdit:setNoteToEdit})});};export default NoteListPage;
